Carl Wyner Javier

085-A Quezon Ave, Dipolog City, Zamboanga del Norte · (+63) 930-626-1832 · carl93.dev@gmail.com

Have been working since 2014 with the role of WEB Developer and PHP Developer (6+ yrs). The first project on my first job was a Health Care System in Chicago USA where we use CodeIgniter Framework, mostly worked on the back-end (PHP) and also with JavaScript and server-side. After 2 and half years working on another company, a Japan Based Company as a PHP developer and my work there is Back-end using CodeIgniter and Laravel for PHP and JSF for the Java2EE project for almost 3 years. My last Company is also Japan Based Company for 3 years more where we use Laravel, Docker, AWS EC2, Ajax, Redis, SSH, PHPUnit testing, and more stuff. We also implement SCRUM with Jira for project management and Agile methodologies. Lead a team of 4 for a year with various projects. Also, have good communication skills in English and am willing to learn new things and adapt easily to a new environment.
